scripts.build: cd ../../crates/swc_isograph_plugin && cargo build --release -p swc_isograph_plugin --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp ../../target/wasm32-wasip1/release/swc_isograph_plugin.wasm ../../libs/isograph-swc-plugin/
scripts.build:debug: cd ../../crates/swc_isograph_plugin && cargo build -p swc_isograph_plugin --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp ../../target/wasm32-wasip1/debug/swc_isograph_plugin.wasm ../../libs/isograph-swc-plugin/
